question: Which of the following clearly defines mixed farming?
option1: Growing rabi as well as kharif crops
option2: Growing several crops and also rearing animals
option3: Growing of fruits as well as vegetables
option4: Growing of several crops in a planned way
answer: Growing several crops and also rearing animals
explanation: Farming along-with crop production and some other agriculture based practice like poultry, dairy farming or beekeeping etc. is known as mixed farming.
